General.Name: Hangzhou Landscape Architecture Design Institute Co Ltd
General.Description: Hangzhou Landscape Architecture Design Institute Co., Ltd. provides landscape design services in China. The company was formerly known as Hangzhou Garden Design Institute and changed its name to Hangzhou Landscape Architecture Design Institute Co., Ltd. in 2002. Hangzhou Landscape Architecture Design Institute Co., Ltd. was founded in 1952 and is based in Hangzhou, China.
